ActivateAnomalyDetector.name: ActivateAnomalyDetector
ActivateAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to activate an anomaly detector

BackTestAnomalyDetector.name: BackTestAnomalyDetector
BackTestAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to run a backtest with an anomaly detector

CreateAlert.name: CreateAlert
CreateAlert.description: Grants permission to create an alert for an anomaly detector

CreateAnomalyDetector.name: CreateAnomalyDetector
CreateAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to create an anomaly detector

CreateMetricSet.name: CreateMetricSet
CreateMetricSet.description: Grants permission to create a dataset

DeactivateAnomalyDetector.name: DeactivateAnomalyDetector
DeactivateAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to deactivate an anomaly detector

DeleteAlert.name: DeleteAlert
DeleteAlert.description: Grants permission to delete an alert

DeleteAnomalyDetector.name: DeleteAnomalyDetector
DeleteAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to delete an anomaly detector

DescribeAlert.name: DescribeAlert
DescribeAlert.description: Grants permission to get details about an alert

DescribeAnomalyDetectionExecutions.name: DescribeAnomalyDetectionExecutions
DescribeAnomalyDetectionExecutions.description: Grants permission to get information about an anomaly detection job

DescribeAnomalyDetector.name: DescribeAnomalyDetector
DescribeAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to get details about an anomaly detector

DescribeMetricSet.name: DescribeMetricSet
DescribeMetricSet.description: Grants permission to get details about a dataset

DetectMetricSetConfig.name: DetectMetricSetConfig
DetectMetricSetConfig.description: Grants permission to detect metric set config from data source

GetAnomalyGroup.name: GetAnomalyGroup
GetAnomalyGroup.description: Grants permission to get details about a group of affected metrics

GetDataQualityMetrics.name: GetDataQualityMetrics
GetDataQualityMetrics.description: Grants permission to get data quality metrics for an anomaly detector

GetFeedback.name: GetFeedback
GetFeedback.description: Grants permission to get feedback on affected metrics for an anomaly group

GetSampleData.name: GetSampleData
GetSampleData.description: Grants permission to get a selection of sample records from an Amazon S3 datasource

ListAlerts.name: ListAlerts
ListAlerts.description: Grants permission to get a list of alerts for a detector

ListAnomalyDetectors.name: ListAnomalyDetectors
ListAnomalyDetectors.description: Grants permission to get a list of anomaly detectors

ListAnomalyGroupRelatedMetrics.name: ListAnomalyGroupRelatedMetrics
ListAnomalyGroupRelatedMetrics.description: Grants permission to get a list of related measures in an anomaly group

ListAnomalyGroupSummaries.name: ListAnomalyGroupSummaries
ListAnomalyGroupSummaries.description: Grants permission to get a list of anomaly groups

ListAnomalyGroupTimeSeries.name: ListAnomalyGroupTimeSeries
ListAnomalyGroupTimeSeries.description: Grants permission to get a list of affected metrics for a measure in an anomaly group

ListMetricSets.name: ListMetricSets
ListMetricSets.description: Grants permission to get a list of datasets

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get a list of tags for a detector, dataset, or alert

PutFeedback.name: PutFeedback
PutFeedback.description: Grants permission to add feedback for an affected metric in an anomaly group

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a detector, dataset, or alert

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a detector, dataset, or alert

UpdateAlert.name: UpdateAlert
UpdateAlert.description: Grants permission to update an alert for an anomaly detector

UpdateAnomalyDetector.name: UpdateAnomalyDetector
UpdateAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to update an anomaly detector

UpdateMetricSet.name: UpdateMetricSet
UpdateMetricSet.description: Grants permission to update a dataset
